name: Alpha Team Shooting
description:
Here we bring you the FPS commando frontline shooter extremist sniper shooter strike. This game will test your shooting skills.

Features:
1- Realistic FPS commando graphics.
2- 3D frontline sniper strike environment that gives the real commando kombat feeling.
3- Upgrades weapons.
4- Extreme Actions on the frontline commando kombat.
5- Realistic sniper shooting skills.
6- Advance commando combat war zone.
